dialogues.text: My mining equipment was stolen by some thugs!

options.text: Do you have any idea who might have done it?
Is there anyone who might have seen it happen?

dialogues.text: I don't. I wasn't home when it happened...
You could ask some people around the town square. They might have seen something.
Oh, you found it! Thank you so much. I hope that's the last we'll be seeing of those thugs.
Please, take this pickaxe as a reward.
Hello again. Thanks for helping out earlier! You are always welcome here in Shamrock Town.
